member.name: T:CptS321.ExpressionTree

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructs the tree from a specific expression

member.name: M:CptS321.ExpressionTree.ContainsVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the variables dictionary contains the given key. For external use
member.returns: True if variable is in the dictionary, false otherwise

member.summary: Sets the specified variable within the ExpressionTree variables dictionary.

member.summary: Evaluates the tree expression to a double value.
member.returns: Value of the expression

member.name: M:CptS321.ExpressionTree.GetVariableNames
member.summary: Gets a list of all the variables in the expression
member.returns: List containing all variable names that an expression depends on

member.summary: Constructs the tree from a specific expression
member.returns: The root node of the expression tree

member.name: M:CptS321.ExpressionTree.InfixToPostfix(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string expression in infix notation (a+b) to prefix notation (ab+) Does not consider Operator Precedence or the inclusion of parentheses
member.returns: Expression in postfix notation

member.name: M:CptS321.ExpressionTree.CreateNode(System.String)
member.summary: Deternimes the type of node based on the input string and creates a corresponding node subclass
member.param: Node name as given in expression
member.returns: A node containing the name and corresponding to the corrext type

member.summary: Redoes the last undone command using the redo stack

member.returns: The name of the top item of the stack

member.name: M:CptS321.SheetInvoker.CheckRedo
member.summary: Checks the top of the redo stack. If stack is not empty, return the name. Returns 0 otherwise
member.returns: The name of the top item of the stack
